snippet: Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan, the Olympic and world champion, took the first step toward defending his title at the Grand Prix of Figure Skating final in Barcelona, earning the highest score in the short program despite a fall.
abstract: Yuzuru Hanyu earns highest score in short program at Grand Prix of Figure Skating final in Barcelona.
lead_paragraph: Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan, the Olympic and world champion, took the first step toward defending his title at the Grand Prix of Figure Skating final in Barcelona, earning the highest score in the short program despite a fall.

headline.main: Japan’s Yuzuru Hanyu Leads Grand Prix
